revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Lost Hotel |image = [[File:Lost Hotel.png|250px]] |caption = A map of Lost Hotel. |tokens = 635,000 |location = West of Route 15. }} '''Lost Hotel''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Kalos]]. It initially has 100 tiles arranged in a 10x10 square, including 10 chest tiles, 23 non-boss encounter tiles, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 8,375,300 HP.
==Encounter Tables== <!--T:2-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:3-->
<!--T:4--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Magneton.png|40px]] Magneton || [[File:Punk_Guy.png|40px]] Punk Guy Sid || [[File:Scrafty.png|40px]] Scrafty, [[File:Sharpedo.png|40px]] Sharpedo, [[File:Pawniard.png|40px]] Pawniard |- | [[File:Electrode.png|40px]] Electrode || [[File:Punk_Guy.png|40px]] Punk Guy Jacques || [[File:Skuntank.png|40px]] Skuntank, [[File:Crawdaunt.png|40px]] Crawdaunt |- | [[File:Litwick.png|40px]] Litwick || [[File:Punk_Guy.png|40px]] Punk Guy Slater || [[File:Dunsparce.png|40px]] Dunsparce |- | [[File:Pawniard.png|40px]] Pawniard || [[File:Punk_Girl.png|40px]] Punk Girl Jeanne || [[File:Seviper.png|40px]] Seviper, [[File:Arbok.png|40px]] Arbok |- | [[File:Klefki.png|40px]] Klefki || [[File:Punk_Girl.png|40px]] Punk Girl Cecile || [[File:Liepard.png|40px]] Liepard, [[File:Liepard.png|40px]] Liepard |}
